result.title: Long Submission Queue
result.content:
Hello all,

Codeforces right now is having the problem of long submission queue. I've submitted a solution to a problem from ~30 mins and still waiting on queue.

In general when I face this problem I just wait until the queue returns to its original state. But today we are running a contest in a group. And it is important to get the result of any submission in reasonable time.What should I do now ?

I thought of delaying the contest but this will cause inconvenience to the participants and it's not guaranteed that after waiting the website will retain it's judgement time.
